title: ‘The Sky Is the Limit’: An Emotional Magnus Sheffield Dedicates Paris-Nice Success to Gino Mäder, Then Aims For More
content:
American talent emerges from the shock and despair of Mäder’s passing to take his biggest-ever career win.

Read the full article at ‘The Sky Is the Limit’: An Emotional Magnus Sheffield Dedicates Paris-Nice Success to Gino Mäder, Then Aims For More on Velo.
author: sstokes
